meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Adam Podber Emily Jusino Mark McDonnell Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #5990.

td.p: Adam Podber, an assistant pool league operator from Brooklyn, New York
Emily Jusino, a Ph.D. candidate in Greek literature originally from Fredericksburg, Virginia
Mark McDonnell, a triathlon coach and entrepreneur from Miami, Florida (whose 1-day cash winnings total $27,601)

tr.td: TABLE OF CONTINENTS
NFL RECORDS
A WINE-WINE SITUATION
FATHERLY NICKNAMES
WELL, DUH!
GET A "CL"UE!

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Greenland is considered a part of it

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_3_4', 'clue_J_3_4_stuck', '(Adam: Um, I\'ve always wanted to say this, Alex. Let\'s bet $100.)
[Laughter]
...
(Adam: Chambre. Um... [laughs] what is... uh, bubbly? I don\'t know.)
(Alex: No. Chambre is French for "room". Hence, [*].)

room temperature

Adam
')

tr.td: Mark
Emily

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Mark
Emily
Adam
19th CENTURY LIT
GLENN CLOSE
(Alex: And Ms. Close will deliver all the clues in the category.)
ART STYLES
BRANDS WE LOST
(Alex: You have to find the engine in the puzzle we will show you in...)
SEARCH: ENGINES
OUT GROWTHS
(Alex: Each correct response can also follow the word "out." Sounds tricky.)

MarkWhat is "porter?"
$6,605
EmilyWhat is janitor?
$9,101
AdamWhat is porter?
$6,101
janitor')
